description: This file demonstrates the usage of the GeminiTools Toolkit for image generation, including setting up an agent with specific models and tools, and saving generated images to disk.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that manages models and tools to generate responses.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints a response based on a prompt.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the agent to generate a response.
